data.name: PyBNF
data.description: An application for parameterization of biological models available in SBML and BNGL formats. Features include parallelization, metaheuristic optimization algorithms, and an adaptive Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) sampling algorithm.

evidence: "PyBioNetFit (PyBNF) is a general-purpose program for parameterizing biological models..."
"It runs on most Linux and macOS workstations as well on computing clusters." (indicates an end-user program used directly for modeling/analysis)

"PyBioNetFit is released under the BSD-3 license. For more information, refer to the [LICENSE](LICENSE). LANL code designation: C18062" (LANL designation plus org owner implies institutional responsibility; README only mentions source and docs, no package manager or binaries)

checks.reason: no binaries found in the repo
